title: My Summoner Name
body: I'm not sure if this is the right place to post, but I was told in a submitted ticket to post to the boards about this. It was just brought to my attention that apparently part of my summoner name is "inappropriate." I've had this name for years as a username, and also as a summoner name. I'm not exactly sure how "Kiki" is inappropriate, but can someone please tell me why it is, or remove it from the profanity filter? Thankss

replies.body:
I took a look at your ticket and it seems you're interested in finding out more about the profanity filter. You'll want to repost this to the [**Miscellaneous Boards**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) where a member of the teams that work on this feature may see it.

Let me know if you have any questions.
